item.title: Atomic Habits (Quotes)
item.description: Atomic Habits is a book that has become a reference for building good habits. These quotes talk about putting our effort into the systems that maintain improvements instead of setting goals. When willpower fails, habits could be the difference between achieving or not a permanent change in our lifestyle. I will comment more about habits in the future. See you next time.
